suppress.notes:
File name: spring-security-*.jar in combination with Spring Framework 5.0.5.RELEASE
Affects Spring Framework 5.0.5.RELEASE only. ^ However it still flags a false positive with a newer release (5.1.6.RELEASE) So we'll need to leave it here for now. -AO
We're stuck with IMSGlobal/basiclti-util-java using prehistoric dependencies... It's an OS project, perhaps we can contribute and update the deps for them...
